pages.title: Grass Snake
pages.text: The grass snake ($(o)Natrix natrix$()), sometimes called the ringed snake or water snake, is a Eurasian non-venomous colubrid snake.$(br2)It is often found near water and feeds almost exclusively on amphibians.

pages.title: Grass Snake
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
